desmoj.core.simulator

Class UTCTimeFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.PatternBasedTimeFormatter
      • desmoj.core.simulator.UTCTimeFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeFormatter
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by PatternBasedTimeFormatter. Use this class to format TimeInstant objects using a java.text.DateFormat object. The UTCTimeFormatter uses a MultiUnitTimeFormatter to format TimeSpans.

    @Deprecated
public class UTCTimeFormatter
extends PatternBasedTimeFormatter

    • Constructor Detail

      • UTCTimeFormatter

        public UTCTimeFormatter()
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor for a UTCTimeFormatter. This shortcut constructor uses the pattern "dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm:ss:SSS". Default Locale is Germany.

      • UTCTimeFormatter

        public UTCTimeFormatter(java.text.DateFormat dateFormat,
                        java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit coarsestUnit,
                        java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit finestUnit)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor for a UTCTimeFormatter.
        Parameters:
        dateFormat - DateFormat : the dateFormat used by this UTCTimeFormatter.
        coarsestUnit - TimeUnit: The coarsest Unit for the TimeSpan
        finestUnit - TimeUnit: The finest Unit for the TimeSpan

      • UTCTimeFormatter

        public UTCTimeFormatter(java.lang.String pattern,
                        java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit coarsestUnit,
                        java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit finestUnit)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor for a UTCTimeFormatter. Default Locale is Germany.
        Parameters:
        pattern - String : the pattern used by this UTCTimeFormatter to format TimeSpan and TimeInstant objects. See http://download.oracle.com/javase/1.5.0/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html for a description of the syntax of such patterns.
        coarsestUnit - TimeUnit: The coarsest Unit for the TimeSpan
        finestUnit - TimeUnit: The finest Unit for the TimeSpan
